creditline: Gift of Tony and Helen Berlant
description: Flat face; narrow eyes with proper right eye in white and proper left eye and cheek in terra cotta color; metal rods for teeth; beard and moustache braided and twisted brown and tan threads; metal bell and 2 ivory 'teeth' at center of beard
markings: 3 stickers: [11], on round white sticker, and [SH2/-/B], on round purple sticker, both on back at center, on top of sticker with blue border
medium: Wood, metal, thread, ivory, pigment, cloth
title: Mask
